text: Kiya tu ney nahi dekha kay Allah aasmanon ki aur zamin ki her cheez say waqif hai. Teen aadmiyon ki sirgoshi nahi hoti magar Allah unn ka chotha hota hai na paanch ki magar unn ka chatha (6th) woh hota hai aur na iss say kum ki aur na ziyada ki magar woh sath hi hota hai jahan bhi woh hon phir qayamat kay din unhen unn ka aemaal say aagah keray ga be-shak Allah Taalaa her cheez say waqif hai
